div.span: The Hollister R-V School District is committed to student success in both college and career readiness. Strategic planning and foresight has allowed the district to serve students birth through . . .

p.class: sub-text text-right hidden-xs visible-sm visible-md visible-lg
sub-text text-left pull-left visible-xs hidden-sm hidden-md hidden-lg

div.span: The Hollister Early Childhood Center (HECC) houses our preschool, kindergarten and 1st grade. At the HECC, we strive to place student needs and student safety as our number one priority to help . . .

p.class: sub-text text-right hidden-xs visible-sm visible-md visible-lg
sub-text text-left pull-left visible-xs hidden-sm hidden-md hidden-lg

div.span: Hollister Elementary School (HES) houses grades 2nd through 5th. HES is proud to be a Leader in Me school! The Leader in Me is based on the 7 Habits of Highly Effective People by Stephen Covey. . . .

p.class: sub-text text-right hidden-xs visible-sm visible-md visible-lg
sub-text text-left pull-left visible-xs hidden-sm hidden-md hidden-lg

div.span: Hollister Middle School (HMS) is home to our 6th through 8th grades. Hollister Middle School strives for a learning environment where respect and character are shown and students constantly grow. . . .

p.class: sub-text text-right hidden-xs visible-sm visible-md visible-lg
sub-text text-left pull-left visible-xs hidden-sm hidden-md hidden-lg

div.span: Hollister High School (HHS) houses grades 9th through 12th. Hollister High School offers the best education and resources in an ongoing commitment to creating independent thinking, lifelong . . .

p.class: sub-text text-right hidden-xs visible-sm visible-md visible-lg
sub-text text-left pull-left visible-xs hidden-sm hidden-md hidden-lg

div.h4: Due to COVID-19 Hollister Schools campus is closed. Virtual Learning only through May 15.
Summer School Information will be Communicated in the Near Future
We are a school district with an unrelenting focus on learning. All students will succeed, as success is our only option.
Visit our COVID-19 page for up to date information and instructional resources
Be sure to check out our Senior Class of 2020 webpage
If you need assistance, please call 417-243-4000 - leave a message and someone WILL call you back.
3rd quarter report cards will be emailed to parents Monday, April 20

a.aria-label: Previous Announcement
Next Announcement
Back to top of site

div.p:
Hollister R-V School District
1914 State Hwy BB, Hollister, MO 65672
(417) 243-4005
